case.title: Open the form for registration

custom.preconds: Go to http://prod.qa.nolimit.school/

step.content: Go to the home page of Master Study.
step.expected: The home page of Master Study is open

step.content: Click on the little man image in the right in the header.
step.expected: The menu is open.

step.content: Click on the "Login/Sign Up" button.
step.expected: The page with Login and Sign Up forms are open.

case.title: Register a new student with correct data

custom.steps: 1. Input correct data in the login field. 2. Input correct data in the email field. 3. Input correct data in the password field. 4. Input correct data in the repeat password field. 5. Click the Registration button.
custom.expected: The user is registered. A confirmation email is sent to the user. The User profile page is opened.

case.title: Open the form for registration as instructor

custom.steps: 1. Open the registration form. 2. Click on the checkbox "Register as instructor".
custom.expected: "Degree" and "Expertise" fields are displayed, to register as an instructor.

case.title: Register a new instructor

custom.preconds: Sign up form is opened.
custom.steps: 1. Input the correct data in the login field. 2. Input the correct data in the email field. 3. Input the correct data in the password field. 4. Input the correct data in the repeat password field. 5. Input the checkbox next to the register as an instructor. 6. Input the correct data in the Degree field. 7. Input the correct data in the Expertise field. 8. Click on the Register button.
custom.expected: The user is registered. A confirmation email is sent to a user. A user profile page is opened.

case.title: Enabling the registration button

custom.preconds: The Sign Up form is opened.
custom.steps: 1. Input correct data in the login field. 2. Input correct data in the email field. 3. Input correct data in the password field. 4. Input correct data in the repeat password field.
custom.expected: The Register button is enabled.

case.title: Registration button in default state

custom.steps: 1. Open Sign up form. 2. Check the "Register" button on the registration form.
custom.expected: The register button is present in the lower right corner of the form.

case.title: Sending a confirmation email after registration

custom.preconds: The registration form is opened.
custom.steps: 1. Input correct data in the login field. 2. Input correct data in the email field. 3. Input correct data in the password field. 4. Input correct data in the repeat password field. 5. Click the Registration button. 6. Check the inputted email for a confirmation letter.
custom.expected: The confirmation letter is sent to the email of the newly registered user.

case.title: Register with empty fields in data

custom.preconds: Sign up/Login page is open.
custom.steps: 1. On the sign-up page do not input any data. 2. Click on the Register button.
custom.expected: The error message is displayed. The error text is displayed below the fields without data. The error fields are framed and highlighted in red color.

case.title: Register with login 8 symbols

custom.steps: 1. Open Sign up form. 2. In a login field input 8 symbols (include letters, capital letters, numbers, special symbols) 3. Input the correct data in the password field and repeat the password. 4. Click on the Register button.
custom.expected: The user is successfully registered. A confirmation email is sent to the user. The personal account page is open.

case.title: Register with login <8 symbols

custom.steps: 1. Open Sign up page. 2. In a login field input <8 symbols (include letters, capital letters, numbers, special symbols) 3. Input the correct data in the password field and repeat the password. 4. Click on the Register button.
custom.expected: The error message is displayed. The login field is framed and highlighted in red color.

case.title: Regisrer with login 32 symbols

custom.steps: 1. Open Sign up form. 2. In a login field input 32 symbols (include letters, capital letters, numbers, special symbols) 3. Input the correct data in the password field and repeat the password. 4. Click on the Register button.
custom.expected: The user is successfully registered. A confirmation email is sent to the user. The personal account page is opened.

case.title: Register with login >32 symbols

custom.steps: 1. The Signup page is open. 2. In a login field input >32 symbols (including letters, capital letters, numbers, and special symbols) 3. Input the correct data in the password field and repeat the password. 4. Click on the Register button.
custom.expected: The error message is displayed. The login field is framed and highlighted in red color.

case.title: Register email without @ symbol

custom.preconds: Log in/Sign up page is open.
custom.steps: 1. Input correct data in the login field. 2. Input email without the "@" symbol in the email field. 3. Input the correct data in the password field and repeat the password. 4. Click on the Register button.
custom.expected: Error message is displayed on form. Email fiel is fraimed and highlighted in red colour.

case.title: Register a user with the same login that was registered earlier

custom.preconds: Register a new user on the website.
custom.steps: 1. Open the Signup page. 2. Input login that you registered before in the login field. 3. Input correct data in the email field. 4. Input correct data in the password field. 5. Input correct data in the repeat password field. 6. Click the Registration button.
custom.expected: The error message that an account with such a login already exists in the system is displayed.

case.title: Register a user with the same email that was regisred earlier

custom.preconds: Register a new user on the website.
custom.steps: 1. Open the Signup page. 2. Input correct data in the login field. 3. Input the same email that you register before in the email field. 4. Input correct data in the password field. 5. Input correct data in the repeat password field. 6. Click the Registration button.
custom.expected: The error message that an account with such an email already exists in the system is displayed.

case.title: Register a user with a different repeated password

custom.steps: 1. Input correct data in the login field. 2. Input correct data in the email field. 3. Input correct data in the password field. 4. Input incorrect data in the repeat password field. 5. Click the Registration button.
custom.expected: The error message that the repeated password is wrong is displayed.

case.title: Register with password 8 symbols

custom.steps: 1. Input correct data in the login field. 2. Input correct data in the email field. 3. Input 8 symbols in the password field. 4. Input 8 symbols in the repeat password field. 5. Click the Registration button.
custom.expected: The user is successfully registered. A confirmation email is sent to the user. The personal account page is open.

case.title: Register with password <8 symbols

custom.steps: 1. Input correct data in the login field. 2. Input correct data in the email field. 3. Input <8 symbols in the password field. 4. Input <8 symbols in the repeat password field. 5. Click the Registration button.
custom.expected: The error message that the password is invalid is displayed.

case.title: Register with password 32 symbols

custom.steps: 1. Input correct data in the login field. 2. Input correct data in the email field. 3. Input 32 symbols in the password field. 4. Input 32 symbols in the repeat password field. 5. Click the Registration button.
custom.expected: The user is successfully registered. A confirmation email is sent to the user. The personal account page is open.

case.title: Register with password >32 symbols

custom.steps: 1. Input correct data in the login field. 2. Input correct data in the email field. 3. Input >32 symbols in the password field. 4. Input >32 symbols in the repeat password field. 5. Click the Registration button.
custom.expected: The error message that the password is invalid is displayed.

case.title: Login as a student or instructor with correct data

custom.preconds: The user is registered.
custom.steps: 1. Open the Login page. 2. Input correct data in the login field. 3. Input correct data in the password field. 4. Click on the Login button.
custom.expected: The user is redirected to the personal account page.

case.title: Login after click on checkbox "Remember Me"

custom.preconds: The user is registered with a checkbox "remember me".

step.content: Open the Login page.
step.expected: Login and password data are automatically displayed in fields.

step.content: Click on the login button.
step.expected: The personal account page is open.

case.title: Login with facebook

custom.preconds: The user is registered and login on Facebook.

step.content: Open the login page.
step.expected: The login page is open.

step.content: Click on the line "Login with Facebook"
step.expected: The system redirects the user on login with the Facebook page.

step.content: Log in with a Facebook page is open.
step.expected: Login and password are displayed in the Login and Password fields.

step.content: Click on the Login button.
step.expected: The system redirects the user to the personal account page.

case.title: Login with google

custom.preconds: The user is registered in Google.

step.content: Open login page.
Click on the line "Login with Google"
step.expected: The system redirects the user to the login with google page.

step.content: Login with google page is open.
step.expected: Login and password are displayed in the login and password fields.

step.content: Click on the Login button.
step.expected: The personal account page is open.

case.title: Enabling the Login button

custom.preconds: The Login form is opened.
custom.steps: 1. Input correct data in the login/email field. 2. Input correct data in the password field.
custom.expected: The Register button is enabled.

case.title: Login button in default state

custom.steps: 1. Open the Login form. 2. Check the "Login" button on the login form.
custom.expected: The login button is present in the lower right corner of the form.

case.title: Login with 8 symbols in login field

custom.steps: 1. Open the login page. 2. Input in the login field 8 symbols. 3. Input the correct data in the password field. 4. Click on the login button.
custom.expected: The user is successfully login. The personal account page is opened.

case.title: Login with <8 symbols in login field

custom.steps: 1. Open the login page. 2. Input in the login field <8 symbols. 3. Input the correct data in the password field. 4. Click on the login button.
custom.expected: The error message is displayed. The login field is highlighted in red color.

case.title: Login with 32 symbols in login field

custom.steps: 1. Open the login page. 2. Input in the login field 32 symbols. 3. Input the correct data in the password field. 4. Click on the login button.
custom.expected: The user is successfully login. The personal account page is opened.

case.title: Login with >32 symbols in login field

custom.steps: 1. Login page is open. 2. Input >32 symbols in the login field. 3. Input correct data in the password field. 4. Click on the login button.
custom.expected: The error message is displayed. Login field highlighted in red color.

case.title: Login with login that wasn't registered in system

custom.steps: 1. Login page is open. 2. Input in the login field data that wasn't registered in the system before. 3. Input the correct data in the password field. 4. Click on the login button.
custom.expected: The error message is displayed. Login field highlighted in red color.

case.title: Login with no existing email

custom.steps: 1. Open the login page. 2. Input the correct data in the login field. 3. Input in the password field data that wasn't registered in the system before. 4. Click on the login button.
custom.expected: The error message is displayed. The Password field is highlighted in red color.

case.title: Login with incorrect password

custom.steps: 1. Open the login page. 2. Input email that wasn't registered in the system in the login field. 3. Input the correct data in the password field. 4. Click on the login button.
custom.expected: The error message is displayed. The login field is highlighted in red color.

case.title: Sending email after submitting lost password

custom.preconds: Register in the system.
custom.steps: 1. Open the login page. 2. Click on the line "Lost password". 3. In the displayed email line input the correct email that was registered in system before. 4. Click on the button Send. 5. Check that email.
custom.expected: The system sends an email with a form to create a new password.

case.title: Opening my account page after registration

custom.steps: 1. Open the registration form. 2. Input correct data in all required fields. 3. Click on the Register button.
custom.expected: The user is registered in the system. The My Account page is opened.

case.title: Opening my account page after login

custom.steps: 1. Open the Login form. 2. Input correct data in all required fields. 3. Click on the Login button.
custom.expected: The user is ligin in the system. The My Account page is opened.

case.title: Opening my account page by direct link

custom.steps: 1. Open the My Account page. 2. Copy the direct link of My Account in the URL line. 3. Open a new tab in the browser. 4. Paste the copied link in the URL line. 5. Press Enter button on the keyboard.
custom.expected: The My Account page is opened.

case.title: Check the required menu items on my account page

custom.preconds: The user is registered and login into the system.
custom.steps: 1. Open the My Account page. 2. Check the menu item My courses. 3. Check the menu item My quizzes. 4. Check the menu item My orders. 5. Check the menu item My memberships.
custom.expected: All required menu items are available.

case.title: Check the icon for upload picture on my account page

custom.preconds: The user is registered and login into a system.
custom.steps: 1. Open the My Account page. 2. Check the icon in the upper-left corner for upload pictures.
custom.expected: The icon for uploading pictures is available.

case.title: Check the "No Courses" message in the menu tab "Courses"

custom.preconds: The user is registered in the system. The user has no courses yet.
custom.steps: 1. Open the My Account page. 2. Check the "No courses" message under the My Courses menu item.
custom.expected: The "No courses" message is displayed in the My Courses menu item.

case.title: Check the edit profile link

custom.steps: 1. Open the My Account page. 2. Check the Edit profile link on the lower-left side of the form.
custom.expected: The Edit Profile link is available.

case.title: Check the "Edit Profile" button on my account page

custom.preconds: The user is registered in the system.
custom.steps: 1. Open the personal account page. 2. Check the availability of the "Edit profile" link in the lower-left corner.
custom.expected: The "Edit profile" Link is available on a personal account page.

case.title: Open the Edit profile form

custom.preconds: The user is registered in the system.
custom.steps: 1. Open the personal account page. 2. Click on the Edit profile link in the lower-left corner.
custom.expected: The Edit profile form is opened.

case.title: Edit profile form contains all required fields

custom.preconds: The user is registered in the system. My account page is opened.
custom.steps: 1. Open Edit profile form. 2. Check the availability of the name text field. 3. Check the availability of the surname text field. 4. Check the availability of the BIO text field.
custom.expected: The Edit profile form contains the name, surname, and BIO text fields.

case.title: Edit profile form contains "Save changes" button

custom.preconds: The user is registered in the system. The personal account page is opened.
custom.steps: 1. Open the Edit profile form. 2. Scroll down to the bottom of the form. 3. Check the availability of the "Save changes" button.
custom.expected: The "Save changes" button is available on the Edit profile form.

case.title: Edit profile with saving changes

custom.preconds: The user is registered in the system. The personal account page is opened.
custom.steps: 1. Open the Edit profile form. 2. Input the correct data in the name field. 3. Input the correct data in the surname field. 4. Input the correct data in the BOI field. 5. Click on the "Save changes button.
custom.expected: The "Successfully saved" message is displayed under the "Save changes" button. The inputted data is saved in the user's profile.

case.title: Close the Edit profile form

custom.preconds: The user is registered in the system. The personal account page is opened.

step.content: Click on the Edit profile link in the lower-left corner.
step.expected: The Edit profile form is opened.

step.content: Click on the same Edit profile link on the left.
step.expected: The edit profile form is closed. The personal account page is displayed on the screen.

case.title: Upload photo to profile

custom.preconds: The user is registered in the system. The personal account page is opened.

step.content: Click on the circle picture icon on the upper-left side of the My account page.
step.expected: The pop-up window is opened.

step.content: Choose the photo from the device's gallery and click the "Open" button.
step.expected: The chosen photo is uploaded and displayed in a circle icon.

case.title: Check the pop up for select image

custom.preconds: The user is registered and login into a system.
custom.steps: 1. Open the My Account page. 2. Click on the icon in the upper-left corner to upload pictures.
custom.expected: The pop-up window for upload photos is displayed.

case.title: Upload photo in .png format

custom.preconds: The user is registered in the system. The personal account page is opened. The .png file is ready for uploading in the device's gallery.

step.content: Click on the circle picture icon on the upper-left side of the My account page.
step.expected: The pop-up window is opened.

step.content: Choose the photo from the device's gallery in .png and click the "Open" button.
step.expected: The chosen photo is uploaded and displayed in a circle icon.

case.title: Upload photo in .jpg format

custom.preconds: The user is registered in the system. The personal account page is opened. The .png file is ready for uploading in device's gellery.

step.content: Click on the circle picture icon on the upper-left side of the My account page.
step.expected: The pop-up window is opened.

step.content: Choose the photo from the device's gallery in .jpg and click the "Open" button.
step.expected: The chosen photo is uploaded and displayed in a circle icon.

case.title: Upload photo in .jpeg format

custom.preconds: The user is registered in the system. The personal account page is opened. The .jpeg file is ready for uploading in the device's gallery.

step.content: Click on the circle picture icon on the upper-left side of the My account page.
step.expected: The pop-up window is opened.

step.content: Choose the photo from the device's gallery in .jpeg and click the "Open" button.
step.expected: The chosen photo is uploaded and displayed in a circle icon.

case.title: Upload photo in invalid format

custom.preconds: The user is registered in the system. The personal account page is opened. The invalid file format, for example .CR2 file is ready for uploading in the device's gallery.

step.content: Click on the circle picture icon on the upper-left side of the My account page.
step.expected: The pop-up window is opened.

step.content: Choose the photo from the device's gallery in ivalid format for example .CR2 and click the "Open" button.
step.expected: The error message is displayed.

case.title: Logout button in default state

custom.preconds: The user is registered and login into the system.
custom.steps: 1. Home page is open. 2. Click on the icon in the upper-right corner. 3. In the displayed menu check the Logout button.
custom.expected: The Logout button is available in the menu.

case.title: Check Logout button when user non-authorized

custom.preconds: The http://prod.qa.nolimit.school/ is opened. The user is not registered in the system.
custom.steps: 1. Open mane page of a web site. 2. Click on the icon in the upper-right ci=orner. 3. In opened menu check the Logout button.
custom.expected: The logout button is absent.

case.title: Check Logout button for authorized user

custom.preconds: The user is registered and login into the system.
custom.steps: 1. Open the home page of the website. 2. Click on the icon in the upper-right corner. 3. In the opened menu check the Logout button.
custom.expected: The Logout button is available in the menu.

case.title: Logout button displayed when edit form is opened

custom.preconds: The user is registered and login into the system. The personal account page is opened.
custom.steps: 1. Click on Edit Profile on the lower-left side. 2. When Edir profile is opened check the Logout button in the upper-right corner of the form.
custom.expected: The Logout button is available.

custom.steps: 1. Open the Edit profile form. 2. Input in the name field 32 symbols. 3. Click the Save changes button.
custom.expected: The message Successfully saved is displayed.

custom.steps: 1. Open the Edit profile form. 2. Input in the surname field >72 symbols. 3. Click the Save changes button.

custom.preconds: The user is registered and login into the system.
custom.steps: 1. Open the Edit profile form. 2. Input in the surname field numbers. 3. Click the Save changes button.
custom.expected: The error message is displayed.

custom.steps: 1. Open the Edit profile form. 2. Input in the surname field special symbols. 3. Click the Save changes button.

case.title: Open the courses page

step.content: Open the home page.
step.expected: The home page is opened.

step.content: Click on the icon on the right side in the header.
step.expected: The menu is displayed.

step.content: Click on the menu item ourses.
step.expected: The page with courses is opened.

case.title: Open the courses page by direct link

custom.preconds: http://test.qa.nolimit.school/ is opened
custom.steps: 1. Open the Courses page. 2. Copy the link in the URL line. 3. Open a new tab in the browser. 4. Paste the link in the URL line. 5. Press the Enter button on the keyboard.
custom.expected: The page with Courses is displayed.

case.title: The courses page is opened by 'view all' link on the main page

custom.steps: 1. Open the home page. 2. In the list of courses click on the "View all" button.
custom.expected: The page with a full list of courses is opened.

case.title: Check that the courses page contains the list of courses

custom.steps: 1. Open the courses page. 2. Check that the courses page contains a list of courses.
custom.expected: The courses page has contained a list of courses.

case.title: The course page can be in the form of a list or a table

step.content: Open the courses page.
step.expected: The courses page is opened.

step.content: Click on the list icon on the upper-right corner of the page.
step.expected: The Courses are displayed in the list form.

step.content: Click on the table icon in the upper-right corner of the page.
step.expected: The Courses are displayed in the table form.

case.title: Sort courses by prise

step.content: 1. Open the courses page.
2. Click on the "Sort by" in the header.
step.expected: The sort menu is displayed.

step.content: 3. In the sort menu select "From min to max".
step.expected: The courses are displayed from minimal price to maximal.

step.content: 4. In the sort menu select "From max to min".
step.expected: The courses are displayed from maximal price to minimal.

case.title: Sort courses by newest/oldest

step.content: 1. Open the courses page.
step.expected: The courses page is opened.

step.content: 2. Click on the "Sort by" in the header.
step.expected: The menu is opened.

step.content: 3. Select the "sort by newest/oldest" .
step.expected: The courses are displayed from newest to oldest or from oldest to newest.

case.title: The button "Load more" is displayed when page contains >8 courses

custom.steps: 1. The courses page is opened. 2. Check that the course page contains more than 8 courses. 3. Scroll down the page.
custom.expected: The "Load more" button is displayed.

case.title: After click on "Load more" button 8 more couses are displayed

custom.steps: 1. Open the courses page. 2. Scroll down the page. 3. Click on the "Load more" button.
custom.expected: 8 more courses are displayed.

case.title: Displaying of "Load more" button when there are <8 courses on the page.

custom.steps: 1. Open the Courses page. 2. Check that there are less than 8 courses displayed on the page. 3. Scroll down the page. 4. Check the "Load more" button.
custom.expected: The "Load more" button is not displayed when there are <8 courses on the page.

case.title: Opening the course page from list on the courses page

custom.steps: 1. Open the courses page. 2. Choose the course from the list. 3. Click on the picture or name of the chosen course.
custom.expected: The course page is opened.

case.title: Opening the course page by direct link.

custom.steps: 1. Open courses page. 2. Copy the link in the URL line. 3. Open a new tab. 4. Paste the link in URL line.
custom.expected: The course page is opened.

case.title: Check the information items about the course on the course page

custom.steps: 1. The course page is open. 2. Chech that all following items are present on the page: - name of the course creator - rating - category - Add to wishList button - image - description - block about the condition (enrolled students, duration, number of lectures, video, level)
custom.expected: The items are present on the course page.

case.title: The Enroll button on the course page

custom.steps: 1. Open any course page. 2. Click on the Get course button. 3. In the dropdown menu must be Enroll item.
custom.expected: The Enroll item is present in the dropdown menu.

case.title: Click on the Enroll button as unauthorized user
case.references: The login pop up is displayed.

custom.steps: 1. Open the course page. 2. Click on the Get course button. 3. Click on the Enroll item in the dropdown menu.
custom.expected: The login pop up is displayed.

case.title: Click on the Enroll button as authorized user

custom.preconds: The user is authorized on the Master Study website.
custom.steps: 1. Open the course page. 2. Click on the Get course button. 3. Click on the Enroll item in the dropdown menu.
custom.expected: The start page is displayed.

case.title: Displayind "Add to wishlist" button on the course preview

custom.steps: 1. Open courses page. 2. Hover over the course. 3. Check the "Add to wishlist" button.
custom.expected: The "Add to wishlist" button is displayed on the course preview.

case.title: Displayind "Add to wishlist" button on the course page

custom.steps: 1. Open the course page. 2. Check the "Add to wishlist" button.
custom.expected: The 'Add to wishlist" button is displayed on the course page.

case.title: Changing "Add to wishlist" button when user add course to wishlist

custom.steps: 1. Open course page. 3. Click on the "Add to wishlist" button.
custom.expected: The "Add to wishlist" is changed into pink color.

case.title: Changing Wishlisted button when user click on it

custom.steps: 1. Open course page. 3. Click on the Wishlisted button.
custom.expected: The Wishlisted button is changed into white color.

case.title: Openind Wishlist by direct linck

custom.steps: 1. Open the wishlist page. 2. Copy the URL link. 3. Open a new tab. 4. Paste the link in the URL line.
custom.expected: The Wishlist page is opened.

case.title: Opening Wishlist by left side menu

custom.steps: 1. Open the home page. 2. Click on the icon in the header. 3. In the opened menu click the Favorites.
custom.expected: The Wishlist is opened.

case.title: Opening course page from wishlist

custom.steps: 1. Open the Wishlist. 2. Click on the course from the list.
custom.expected: The course page is opened.

case.title: Opening the course preview

custom.steps: 1. Open the courses page. 2. Hover over the course.
custom.expected: The course preview is displayed.

case.title: Check the info about course on the preview

custom.steps: 1. Open the courses page. 2. Hover over the course. 3. On the displayed preview check the information about the course.
custom.expected: The information about the course is displayed on the course preview.
